Hi,

I'm testing Heritrix 1.4 on my dedicated box and I have set up a job t=
hat
crawls the following websites:
http://www.eBiomethods.com
http://www.mo=
lecularstation.com

On the console panel, the progress bar shows:

*Rates* =
0 URIs/sec (0.33 avg)
0 KB/sec (10 avg)
*Time* 1d9h17s elapsed
13d20h5m27s =
remaining (estimated)

See that I still have almost 14 days remaining to co=
mplete the crawl. I
wonder if I misconfigured something in the job or it's =
normal?

Thanks!

Tony
